QuestData.Title: Repurposed Technology
QuestData.Description: Ok, I've got it! The rewiring is a little complicated, but nothing a clever $c like you can't handle.$B$BTake my tools and put some of the harvest collectors out of commission. Once they're down use the tools to plug all the red wires into the blue sockets. That'll make them go into self-defense mode. Hurry, $n. Before long there won't be anything left to save.
QuestData.LogDescription: Jeremiah Hawning at Farshire wants you to destroy 5 Harvest Collectors and then use Jeremiah's Tools to rewire them.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice job! I finally feel useful again... and that's sayin' something.
